Package pl.mgarbowski.hotelapp.domain.booking

Interface BookingRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Booking,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Booking,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Booking,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Booking,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Booking,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Booking>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Booking,Integer>
public interface BookingRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Booking,Integer>
Repository interface for Booking entities. Provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Booking entities.

  • Method Details

    • findConflictingBookings

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM get_conflicting_bookings(:apartmentId, :start, :end)", nativeQuery=true) List<Booking> findConflictingBookings(@Param("apartmentId") Integer apartmentId, @Param("start") Date start, @Param("end") Date end)
      Finds bookings that conflict with a given date range for a specific apartment.
      Parameters:
      apartmentId - the ID of the apartment
      start - the start date of the booking
      end - the end date of the booking
      Returns:
      a list of conflicting bookings

      Returns:
      a list of bookings for the customer

    • getActiveBookingsByCustomer

      @Query("SELECT b FROM Booking b JOIN Apartment a ON b.apartment.id = a.id JOIN Hotel h ON a.hotel.id = h.id JOIN Address addr ON h.address.id = addr.id JOIN City c ON addr.city.id = c.id WHERE b.customer.id = :customerId AND b.endDate > current_date") List<Booking> getActiveBookingsByCustomer(@Param("customerId") Integer customerId)
      Finds active bookings for a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer
      Returns:
      a list of active bookings for the customer
